title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by the local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, retrieval, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) to chat with local models, import files, manage prompts, multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting, listing, pulling models from terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experiment to run a GitHub-Copilot-like code-completion service entirely local via Ollama and VS-Code extension.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API for Rust applications.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions, Spring Boot starters, and Maven Central publishing.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama instance using the ollama-js client.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom integration exposing Ollama models as conversation agents for local smart-home AI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama model answers in servers; supports slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama binaries and a NixOS module for declarative local LLM deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing a simple HTTP wrapper to chat and generate with Ollama from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection friendly design.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to integrate local Ollama models into mobile and desktop apps via REST.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda Community extension adding Ollama-backed service tasks for local AI in BPMN workflows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community letting you use Ollama models as generators or rankers in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that forwards channel messages to a local Ollama model and posts streaming replies.
